question: Are there any Dua's to get marry soon and to get health and eemaan??
answer:
QUESTION
i'm 33 years old and I want to get marry soon. I have some health problem too but my doctor said to me to get marry. Pls tell me dua to recite to get marry a good muslim. Also tell me dua for healt and eemaan. Pls do dua for me. JazakAllah.
ANSWER


Share:
We advise you recite Surah Dahr in the 29 Juz as well as recite 500 times
Durood Shareef everyday. Our responsibility is to continue making Du'aa and
await Allah's decision.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
FATWA DEPT.
